org.hs.generator
Class GConstruct

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.hs.generator.GConstruct
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, org.hs.util.Copy, at.dms.compiler.PhylumListener, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CodeNode, GArrayAccess, GBinary, GBlock, GBreak, GCast, GCatch, GClassInit, GCode, GComparison, GContinue, GGroup, GIf, GInstanceOf, GLiteral, GLoop, GMethod, GMethodCall, GNew, GNewArray, GReference, GReturn, GSourceFile, GStepwise, GSwitchLabelGroup, GSynchronized, GThrow, GTry, GType, GTypeDeclaration, GUnary, GVariable, GVariableList
public abstract class GConstruct
extends Object
implements at.dms.compiler.PhylumListener, Serializable, org.hs.util.Copy, Cloneable

The base class of all code constructs in this package, GConstruct allows comments to be attached to it, and provides facilities for copying and convenient reflection access.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

GConstruct

public GConstruct(String name)
Construct a GConstruct with the given name for use as a token reference.

Parameters:
name - The internal name of this GConstruct code token, to be used by the default error reporting facility of the compiler in place of a line number (since there are no explicit line breaks in generated code).
Method Detail

shallowCopy

public org.hs.util.Copy shallowCopy()
Clone me.

Specified by:
shallowCopy in interface org.hs.util.Copy

deepCopy

public org.hs.util.Copy deepCopy()
Traverses all fields of this accessible to the org.hs.generator package, applying deepCopy() to instances of Copy, and otherwise applying direct reference (as does the java.lang.Cloneable.clone() mechanism).

Specified by:
deepCopy in interface org.hs.util.Copy

assume

public void assume(GConstruct base)

get

public Object get(String fieldname)
Get the value of the field named fieldname from this GConstruct, or return null if no such field exists.

Parameters:
fieldname - The name of the field (obtained via java.lang.Class.getField(String)) to query on this GConstruct.

set

public void set(String fieldname,
                Object value)
Set the value of the field named fieldname on this GConstruct. Does nothing if no such field exists.

Parameters:
fieldname - The name of the field (obtained via java.lang.Class.getField(String)) to apply value to on this GConstruct.
value - The new value to be applied to the field on this GConstruct named fieldname, if any such field exists.
